description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry Jelly Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Strawberry Jelly Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 17x27cm slice pan with baking paper. Break cookies into the food processor. Process until they form fine crumbs. With motor running, pour in butter and process until combined. Transfer to a pan and press firmly and evenly over the base. Place in the fridge to chill.

Meanwhile, place gelatine into a small bowl, add 1/4 cup of boiling water and stir well to dissolve. Set aside. Wipe out food processor bowl and add cream cheese. Process until smooth. Add the cream and marshmallows. Process until chopped and combined. Add gelatine liquid and process until evenly mixed. Pour mixture over base and smooth top. Chill for 2 hours.

Empty jelly crystals into a jug. Add 1 cup boiling water and stir to dissolve. Cool to room temperature. Scatter strawberries over filling. Gently pour jelly over strawberries and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or until firm. Remove slice from pan and cut into squares.
